item.title: Solo Concert at Artist Homes on Jun 23, 2022 at 20:00
item.description: Solistenkonzert, um Spenden für Ukrainische Flüchtlinge zu sammeln. Programs F. Liszt - O Lieb, so lang du lieben kannst Ch. Gounod - O Dieu, que de bijoux ‚,Faust“ G. Donizetti - Regnava nel Silenzio ,,Lucia di Lammermoor“ W. A. Mozart - O zittre nicht, mein lieber Sohn ,,Die Zauberflöte“ 김효근 - 내 영혼 바람되어 Time / Location The concert will be held at the Artist Homes in Berlin, https://artist-homes.com/ on Jun 23, 2022 at 20:00.

item.title: Solo Concert at Artist Homes on Jun 23, 2022 at 20:00
item.description: Soloist concert to raise funds for Ukrainian refugees. Programs F. Liszt - O Lieb, so lang du lieben kannst Ch. Gounod - O Dieu, que de bijoux ‚,Faust“ G. Donizetti - Regnava nel Silenzio ,,Lucia di Lammermoor“ W. A. Mozart - O zittre nicht, mein lieber Sohn ,,Die Zauberflöte“ 김효근 - 내 영혼 바람되어 Place / Time The concert will be held at Artist Homes in Berlin on Jun 23, 2022 at 8 pm, which will last about an hour.
